name: TXP_PROTOCOL_HX
description: History of changes to a patient's transplant protocols.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TX_PROTOCOL_HX_C_NAME
columns.description: Store the history of the changes to transplant protocols

columns.name: TX_PROTOCOL_WHO_ID
columns.description: User who changed the transplant protocol

columns.name: TX_PROTOCOL_WHO_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: TX_PROTOCOL_HX_INST
columns.description: Instant of update for the transplant protocol.

columns.name: TX_PROTCOL_HX_ACT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether a protocol was added or removed from the episode.

columns.name: BMT_PROTOCOL_HX_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the history of the changes to blood and marrow transplant protocols.
